diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $JK$ is $2b + 3$ units.
The length of the line $JM$ is $3a$ units.
The length of the line $LK$ is $21$ units.
The measure of angle $RLK$ is $70$ degrees.
The measure of angle $MLJ$ is $30$ degrees.
The length of the line $LM$ is $45$ units.
Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $L$ and $J$.
Point $R$ also lies on the line connecting $M$ and $K$.
line_instances: There are lines $JK$, $LJ$, $MK$, and $LM$, forming the parallelogram and its diagonals.
The line $JM$ and $LK$ are the diagonals of the parallelogram $JKLM$
